name: Live-Chat
info: Live-Chat is Full Stack Chating App  where we do individual and group chat . It is real time chatting app make by socket.io.
team: This is the project that was individually done by me and completed in 8 Days.

name: Ecommerce Backend Application
info: created back-end application of an eCommerce website like Amazon with multiple APIs for users, Products, carts & orders.Used JWT for authentication for the protected APIs, and used Bcrypt hash Function to store passwords.This project also provides backend support to the website like e-Commerce & Online shops provide features like Product management, Cart management, Order detail & status, Search products, Filter & Sorting, product description etc.
team: A collaborative project of 3 team members completed in 5 days.
tstack: NodeJs | ExpressJs | JavaScript | MongoDb | Aws s3 | JWT

name: URL Shortner Backend Application
info: Created a backend of URL shortening service like Bitly or Tinyurl for easy sharing of long URLs, also implemented caching using Redis to deliver quick response.
team: That was individually done by me and completed in 5 Days.

name: OpenToIntern Backend Application(Internshala clone)
info: This project make work very easy for organizations who conduct internship or training programs. Interns student can easily register himself and organization can manage student data very easily, Sort student according to college.
team: That was individually done by me and completed in 3 Days.

name: BloggingSite Backend Application
info: Now a day Blogging is most popular in world wide to share your thoughts on a particular subject. This project helps you to create, update or delete blogs on website or on application, Readers read the blogs, Find blogs using filters. Developed backend of a blogging site like Medium and Quora with multiple APIs for user registration with CRUD operations on blog resources and authentication, authorization with the help of Json Web Token
team: This is the project that was individually done by me and completed in 3 Days.
